page.title: 20FAMILY LIFE - SCOTT
page.content: I am 9 years old and I live in Godshill.I have one brother called Darren who is 15. We all get up at 7 o'clock and have breakfast. My brother and I each have a boiled egg with bread and butter and a cup of tea. My Mum has cornflakes. She works at the Great Budbridge Manor tomato nursery. My Dad drives a lorry for the County Council. He is just tarring some roads now. I go to Godshill County Primary School until September when I will go to Ventnor Middle School for 4 years. Then I go on to Medina High School where my brother is now. Our house is about 20 years old. We rent it from the County Council. It has 3 bedrooms, one living room, a kitchen and a bath- room. We have a brown car called an Austin 1300 which we bought second hand about a year ago.
